conbody.p: Design Studio includes Visual Rules, which is a third-party product developed by our partner Innovations.

Visual Rules allows the graphical design of business rules, from which Javacode can then be generated. In Design Studio there are dedicated points defined where rules can be created, like validation rules for domain entities or other.

Visual Rules is like Design Studio a pure Eclipse application, consisting out of features and plugins. Innovations has implemented a couple of APIs that allow Design Studio to seamlessly integrate Visual Rules, such that it does not become evident that it is in reality a third-party product.
